content: July 9 Canada's Teck Resources Ltd  agreed to sell future output from its Chile mine to Royal Gold Inc  for $525 million upfront payment and 15 percent of monthly average gold price at each delivery.
name: Royal Gold Inc
title: Teck to sell future gold from Chile's CDA to Royal Gold
